definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: Final award has already been made on the first newsprint paper antidumping case.
sentences.chinese: 首例新闻纸反倾销案已经终裁。

sentences.english: Dumping and antidumping have always accompanied with the international economic and trade association.
sentences.chinese: 倾销与反倾销是国际经济贸易交往的伴生物。

sentences.english: This thesis studies anti-dumping accounting in China.
sentences.chinese: 本论文是对我国反倾销会计的研究。

sentences.english: US keeps duties on China's pipe fittings .
sentences.chinese: 美国继续征收碳钢对焊管件反倾销税。

sentences.english: This article proposed that counter-dumping needs the enterprise aspects the support.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出反倾销需要企业方方面面的支持。

sentences.english: At present, dumping and anti-dumping have already become the focuses of international community.
sentences.chinese: 目前，倾销与反倾销已成为国际社会关注的焦点问题。

sentences.english: Natural relationship exists between anti-dumping law and competition law.
sentences.chinese: 反倾销法与竞争法存在一些天然的联系。

sentences.english: The amount of the anti-dumping duty shall not exceed the margin of dumping as established under Article 2.
sentences.chinese: 反倾销税的金额不得超过根据第2条确定的倾销幅度。

sentences.english: Natural relationship exits between anti-dumping law and competition law.
sentences.chinese: 反倾销法与竞争法存在一些天然的联系。

sentences.english: Roughly half of the anti-dumping measures in the world are aimed at China.
sentences.chinese: 全世界的反倾销中约有一半都针对中国。

sentences.english: The suggestions on improving the effectiveness of anti-dumping on chemical industry in chemical industry were given of at last.
sentences.chinese: 最后针对目前反倾销中存在的问题提出了一些建议。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the function of trade protectionism of Euro-American anti-dumping act is reinforced.
sentences.chinese: 当代欧美反倾销法的贸易保护主义功能越来越强。

sentences.english: The use of trade restrictions such as anti-dumping duties has been quite restrained.
sentences.chinese: 各国对反倾销关税之类贸易限制的使用一直相当克制。

sentences.english: Anti-circumvention measure is the important component of antidumping law.
sentences.chinese: 反规避措施是反倾销法的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Circumvention and anti-circumvention will become a major theme in the domain of anti-dumping.
sentences.chinese: 规避与反规避问题将成为反倾销领域的主题。

sentences.english: This chapter outlines the framework and background of the EU anti-dumping law.
sentences.chinese: 这一章勾勒出了欧盟反倾销法的框架和背景。
